item.title: ::copy command need help
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

oh my bad here

[code] if (command.startsWith(“c0py”) && playerRights == 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                   playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
		playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
		sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                   } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to copy..");
            }
        }	[/code]

This will only copy the weapon, see if you take each section like this:

playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet]; playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1; setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);

and replace it with what i showed u. ex:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“c0py”) && playerRights == 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                   playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
		playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
		sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                   } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to copy..");
            }
        }[/code]

it will only copy that item.

of course you can always change the message it sends but the base is there

Read full topic

item.title: ::copy command need help
item.dc:creator: @v0x v0x
item.description:
@v0x wrote:

try this

[code]if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && playerRights == 3) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
                   playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
		playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
                   playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
		playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
                   playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
		playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
                   playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
		playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);
                   playerEquipment[playerLegs] = p.playerEquipment[playerLegs];
		playerEquipmentN[playerLegs] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerLegs], 1, playerLegs);
                   playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
		playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
                   playerEquipment[playerHands] = p.playerEquipment[playerHands];
		playerEquipmentN[playerHands] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHands], 1, playerHands);
                   playerEquipment[playerCape] = p.playerEquipment[playerCape];
		playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape], 1, playerCape);
                   playerEquipment[playerShield] = p.playerEquipment[playerShield];
		playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerShield], 1, playerShield);
		pGender = p.pGender;
		pHead = p.pHead;
		pBeard = p.pBeard; 
		pTorso = p.pTorso;
		pArms = p.pArms;
		pHands = p.pHands;
		pLegs = p.pLegs;
		pFeet = p.pFeet;
		pHairC = p.pHairC;
		pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC;
		pLegsC = p.pLegsC;
		pFeetC = p.pFeetC;
		pSkinC = p.pSkinC;
		sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                   } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to copy..");
            }
        }[/code]

item.title: ::copy command need help
item.dc:creator: @dention1 dention1
item.description:
@dention1 wrote:

Have you guys ever heard of ::copy for Player rights 2 that allows you to copy a characters item? Can someone please tell me how i make it so that it cant copy certain items?

EDIT:: just incase this helps heres the code i use for it.

if (command.startsWith(“copy”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(5);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
		if(p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon] != 4508) {
                   playerEquipment[playerWeapon] = p.playerEquipment[playerWeapon];
		playerEquipmentN[playerWeapon] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerWeapon], 1, playerWeapon);
		}
                   playerEquipment[playerHat] = p.playerEquipment[playerHat];
		playerEquipmentN[playerHat] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHat], 1, playerHat);
		if(p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet] != 6577) {
                   playerEquipment[playerAmulet] = p.playerEquipment[playerAmulet];
		playerEquipmentN[playerAmulet] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerAmulet], 1, playerAmulet);
		}
		if(p.playerEquipment[playerChest] != 6384) {
                   playerEquipment[playerChest] = p.playerEquipment[playerChest];
		playerEquipmentN[playerChest] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerChest], 1, playerChest);
		}
                   playerEquipment[playerLegs] = p.playerEquipment[playerLegs];
		playerEquipmentN[playerLegs] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerLegs], 1, playerLegs);
                   playerEquipment[playerFeet] = p.playerEquipment[playerFeet];
		playerEquipmentN[playerFeet] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerFeet], 1, playerFeet);
                   playerEquipment[playerHands] = p.playerEquipment[playerHands];
		playerEquipmentN[playerHands] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerHands], 1, playerHands);
                   playerEquipment[playerCape] = p.playerEquipment[playerCape];
		playerEquipmentN[playerCape] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerCape], 1, playerCape);
                   playerEquipment[playerShield] = p.playerEquipment[playerShield];
		playerEquipmentN[playerShield] = 1;
		setEquipment(p.playerEquipment[p.playerShield], 1, playerShield);
		pGender = p.pGender;
		pHead = p.pHead;
		pBeard = p.pBeard; 
		pTorso = p.pTorso;
		pArms = p.pArms;
		pHands = p.pHands;
		pLegs = p.pLegs;
		pFeet = p.pFeet;
		pHairC = p.pHairC;
		pTorsoC = p.pTorsoC;
		pLegsC = p.pLegsC;
		pFeetC = p.pFeetC;
		pSkinC = p.pSkinC;
		sM("You have copied "+p.playerName+".");
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to Copy.");
            }
        }

Read full topic
